actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Resolution to refer H.R. 1561 a bill for the relief of the Upper Allegheny Sand and Gravel Company, to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 1561, a bill for the relief of the Upper Allegheny Sand and Gravel Company, to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.

titles.title: Resolution to refer H.R. 1561 a bill for the relief of the Upper Allegheny Sand and Gravel Company, to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.
